msg.msgText: Selection criteria: ClientID Client ID UserID User name GroupID Group name CommonNames Common names specified in the certificate ClientAddress Client IP address Protocol Comma-delimited list of names of the protocol Options: JMS,MQTT If there are any protocol plug-ins installed on the IBM MessageSight server, you can specify these as well. AllowDurable Specify if an MQTT client can connect with CleanSession 0. The default value is True. AllowPersistentMessages Specify if an MQTT client can publish messages with a QoS of 1 or 2. The default value is True.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
